Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
The above named candidate applied to register with Teach In, in order to find teaching assignments in the UK, and has given your name as a referee.
We undertake strict vetting checks in respect of all candidates who register with us before we offer them work in schools. Your response is an important part of these checks.
We would be grateful, if you would complete the attached reference request form and return it at your earliest convenience.
Please note that Teach In encompasses two teaching businesses, Supply Desk Limited and Just Teachers Limited and both entities will rely on your reference.
Thank you in advance for your cooperation.
Yours sincerely
The Compliance Team Teach In Tel No: 00 44 114 257 2716 Email: gemma.yates@teachin.co.uk
